patthana3.8:6.1: Nonīvaraṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:7.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.8:9.1: Nīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:9.2: Nīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:9.3: Nīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo akusalo ca nonīvaraṇo akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:10.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.8:13.1: Nīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana3.8:14.1: Nonīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana3.8:15.1: Nīvaraṇañca nonīvaraṇañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana3.8:15.2: vicikicchānīvaraṇañca uddhaccanīvaraṇañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.
patthana3.8:16.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava … pe … nakamme tīṇi … pe … navippayutte nava.
patthana3.8:18.1: Nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo nīvaraṇassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.8:19.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.8:23.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.8:24.1: Nonīvaraṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:25.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.8:29.1: Nīvaraṇiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.8:30.1: Anīvaraṇiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anīvaraṇiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:31.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.8:33.1: Nīvaraṇiyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:34.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.8:36.1: Nīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.8:37.1: Anīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.8:38.1: Nīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākatañca anīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:39.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … āsevane ekaṃ … pe … vipāke pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.8:42.1: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:43.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.8:45.1: Nīvaraṇasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:46.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.8:48.1: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:49.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.8:53.1: Nīvaraṇiyañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo ceva no ca nīvaraṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:54.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.8:56.1: Nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇiyañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇiyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.8:57.1: Nīvaraṇiyañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo ceva no ca nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.8:58.1: Nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇiyaṃ akusalañca nīvaraṇiyañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo ca nīvaraṇiyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.8:59.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.8:61.1: Nīvaraṇiyañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo ceva no ca nīvaraṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:62.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.8:66.1: Nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:67.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.8:71.1: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto nīvaraṇiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.8:72.1: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ anīvaraṇiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto anīvaraṇiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:73.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.8:75.1: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto nīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.8:76.1: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ anīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto anīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.8:77.1: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākatañca nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ anīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto nīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.8:78.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … āsevane ekaṃ, vipāke pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
